p: Forty years later, herbal LEK has been transformed, as has the way the community inhabits the Sangone Valley. Dwelling is the result of the different activities a community or an individual performs in the landscape and on the basis of this activity they experience and know their surroundings thereby developing their knowledge [ 75, 76]. In this respect, the transformation of LEK is the result of a nonlinear history [ 77] of demography, education and economy.
